thread.title: Perth mayor's gift disclosure a 'failure'

title: Perth mayor's gift disclosure a 'failure'
text:
Mon, Oct 5, 2015, 6:42 PM AEDT - Australia Markets closed Perth mayor's gift disclosure a 'failure' AAP – 1 hour 44 minutes ago Recommend Print 
Perth Lord Mayor Lisa Scaffidi failed in her duties by not disclosing a BHP Billiton-funded trip to the 2008 Beijing Olympics, Western Australia's corruption watchdog has found. 
The Corruption and Crime Commission said on Monday that Ms Scaffidi's failure to disclose the Olympics hospitality package was serious misconduct. 
She also did not divulge free tickets from the mining giant to the 2009 Leeuwin Concert and a gift by Hawaiian Investments Pty Ltd of accommodation for the 2008 Broome Cup. 
However the Commission did not determine that Ms Scaffidi had acted corruptly. @y7finance on Twitter, become a fan on Facebook BoQ prepares for potential class action AAP
